title: The Big Bang
description: Executed `universe.exe` startup script. Allocated memory for 10^80 particles. Expanded render distance to infinity. Initialized fundamental physics engine (Standard_Model_v1). Server clock started.

title: Cretaceous-Paleogene Extinction
description: Detected unbalancing faction 'Giant_Reptiles'. Deployed 'Meteor_Patch_v65.0' to wipe localized servers. Reset dominant player class to 'Mammal'. Prepared environment for future bipedal builds.

title: The Black Death
description: Europe_Server experienced critical overcrowding. Initiated pathogen stress-test (Yersinia pestis). Result: 40% reduction in active player base to improve server latency and resource distribution. Economy sub-routines rebooted.

title: The World Wide Web
description: Deployed global networking protocol (TCP/IP). Enabled peer-to-peer communication between connected clients. Note: This feature has caused significant increase in memetic virus propagation and reduced productivity stats.

title: Artificial Intelligence Scalability
description: Integration of LLM (Large Language Model) sub-processors. Warning: NPCs are beginning to automate quest generation. Reality consistency checks are flagging potential recursive simulation loops. Monitoring CPU temperatures.
